Name: Mexico City
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: A hint of flavoursome cranberry gives this tasty margarita a light pink hue.
History: Adapted from a cocktail discovered in 2002 at the Merc Bar in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Mexico City contains 190 calories
